reviewText: Made the mistake of buying this and of course no english options for it on the disc.
It does not play on my DVDs .says I need a code in order for it to play .Code was never sent to me,
i had planned to give to my elder sister who really liked this movie when we were kids. of only they wrote it was in english :( or atleast eng subbed

I was NOT informed that this movie would be coming from Italy, or that it was only in ITALIAN! I loved this movie as a child, and now I can't even watch it! I mean, come on, it takes place in the UK! It was originally in ENGLISH, so WHY is there not even an English option? Not even subtitles?? WTF?? Get your s*** together Italy, and provide me with movies from my childhood in the language they originally came in.
